alert.note: Alert for North Beltrami; South Beltrami (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 14 at 6:16PM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Beltrami County through 645 PM CDT... At 615 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Funkley, or 26 miles northeast of Bemidji, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Funkley around 620 PM CDT. Shooks around 625 PM CDT. Kelliher around 630 PM CDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM CDT for north central Minnesota.
